messages.message: <!here> hi all, as part of our plan to migrate from rabbitmq-ha to amazonmq in MT aihubs, we’ll be switching `aihub-sandbox` to use amazonmq during today’s scheduled deployment at 4pm EST. this is a temporary change to increase automation test coverage. we’ll monitor the setup for a few days before switching back to rabbitmq-ha. the transition should be seamless, but please let me know if you notice any issues. i’ll also be keeping an eye on the test results to catch anything unexpected. thank you!
